parser

Interface Rule

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SimpleDOLRule

    public interface Rule
    Represent a rewrite rule. A rule contains a preExpr which contains a list of Symbols that are going to be replaced, and a postExpr that contains the replacing symbols: preExpr -> postExpr.

    Each rule has a probability to happen if it is in conflict with another (for non determinist grammars)

    The rules are divided in 2 groups:

    • simple rules are those which only have one symbol in preExpr
    • complex rules are those which have more than one symbol in preExpr

    Author:
    xinouch

      • getProba

        int getProba()
        Returns:
        the probability for this rule to happen. It is 1 for determinist grammars.
